title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 1 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H3 – Jul 1 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3: Earthquake in college athletics: College athletes can now earn money off their name, image and likeness. Montage: American media praises Xi Jinping. Rush's Timeless Wisdom: Communism. Gwen Berry is wrong about the National Anthem and slavery. Callers.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck
